Text: THANK YOU for sharing these, those mkvs some anonynomous uploaded earlier didn't work on latest vlc for me idk...thanks again, much appreciated for this and the following two.

The MKVs that were posted of these earlier were actually MP4 type videos with the wrong file extension...I could p-lay them, but not convert them with the appropriate tools I had.  I used a different program (for converting mp4 files) on a lark and it worked on all 3.  you're welcome and enjoy...they're hilarious!
